name: Legends of Learning: Joules Labs
description:
Designed to teach school kids about the way pressure and heat both interact to determine any material's state, this game has you performing experiments alongside a friendly AI.

The crowning achievement of this game, for me at least, is the fact that you are genuinely performing experiments. You are free to throw the temperature and pressure up to the maximum, just to see what will happen from the moment you're given access to the controls. If all you want to do is mess with the sliders, that's fine, but there's an actual set of objectives to complete and science trivia incorporated for a more guided experience.

Frederic Babord was my co-programmer, Georg Engebakken did the art.
